episodes.title: I was in a Alcoholics Anonymous cult for 10 years | Roya Allegra
episodes.description:
Hi! Comment and share your story as well. 

This is my journey explaining how the community (although good intent) in Alcoholics Anonymous is based off 3 concepts: fear mongering, victim consciousness, and shame consciousness. 

How these 3 ideologies kept me in a long 10 year cycle of relapse & recover. 

Finally once I left, I was able to gather my own understanding of what my patterns consisted of and how I can take my power back by unraveling the teachings I carried from this cult like community. 


#alcoholicsanonymous #cult #selfimprovement #spirituality #sobriety #sobrietylife #trauma #empowerment #storytime
